long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Hirebee Sourcing Extension you can save time and source candidates 3 times faster. Simply 
fill in all relevant information with just one click and add where the candidate was sourced from. 

To make your sourcing a success, you can:
 - Assign candidates to open job postings,
 - Add candidates to your potential pipelines,
 - Start your communication with the candidate after adding to your talent pool,

Communication is the key, so we took the extra mile for improved candidate experience: 
 - Get notified when the candidate info passed to your database and update information with new 
   details if needed,
 - Create messages or use our templates to connect with the candidate right from Hirebee 
   dashboard, 
 - Schedule messages for better candidate experience
 - Receive candidate response right on your Hirebee dashboard and have more optimized 
   communication.

Source like a ninja with Hirebee.

You need a Hirebee account to use the Hirebee Sourcing Extension. Request access here: https://hirebee.ai/
